subject: Re: clone()
msgSnippet: ... Correct. The best way to get your wished-for features implemented is to submit test cases that will only run when you are a happy camper. The
messageBody:
--- In junit@egroups.com, David Corbin <dcorbin@m...> wrote:
> I'm sorry to be dense, Kent, but I wish to confirm that this is a
> request form me (or someone) to post TestCases for this feature on
> SourceForge?

Correct. The best way to get your wished-for features implemented is
to submit test cases that will only run when you are a happy camper.
The implementation is optional but appreciated. And sourceforge is
where we look for proposed patches.

Kent
